actions.name: Crush
actions.description: On hit attaches; if target Medium or smaller and the attack had advantage, engulfs the target's head to blind and suffocate. While attached its speed is 0 and it attacks only that target; target can detach with DC 13 STR check; darkmantle can detach using 5 ft. of movement.

actions.name: Darkness Aura (1/Day)
actions.description: Creates a 15-foot-radius magical darkness centered on it while it concentrates (up to 10 minutes); darkness moves with it, spreads around corners, and dispels 2nd-level-or-lower light it overlaps.
